originalText.text: I purchased a ‚Äúfat freeze service on four areas‚Äù through Groupon a few weeks back. Scheduling was easy, location was near by, and the provider was beyond helpful and thoughtful. During my treatments we talked over my history and concerns and even went above and beyond and offered me free add ons. As someone who is self conscious with my body, I never felt uncomfortable or uneasy in the med spa. I would highly recommend bio skin laser to any of my friends or family!

originalText.text: Bioskin Laser is my favorite med spa in Manhattan! From their list of top notch services to their convenient locations (I visit the one on Madison Ave), it's always a pleasure stopping by. I've been a loyal customer for over two years now and look forward to my appointments with Raquel.

originalText.text: This is a long overdue review for my beautiful & professional aesthetician Rakel. I had the Venus Legacy treatments with her for my neck, abdomen, back, arms, and thighs, and the results were amazing. I didn‚Äôt work out or change my diet for the first 3 treatments but still lost 3 pounds. After I began jogging, I lost even more weight and the areas of treatments showed significant improvements ‚Äî my body shape now looks more toned and my skin has less stretch marks. I can‚Äôt express how happy I am now while looking back at my past and recent photos. I‚Äôm a skeptical person but the results are true, so I will definitely come back to Rakel for future maintenance. It‚Äôs a shame that I didn‚Äôt use Venus Legacy sooner before trying out Coolsculpting or Sculpsure in a different spa. Both of these treatments worked, but Coolsculpting was too pricy and Sculpsure was too painful to endure. With Venus Legacy, Rakel could adjust the temperature of the radio-frequency machine and glide it through my areas of treatments, so the results could be more even and targeted. I highly recommend this machine & place and wanna show my greatest appreciation to Rakel ‚Äî all of my friends & families said that I looked great this summer. THANK YOU!! You can‚Äôt get rid of me now! üòÑ

originalText.text: I love this place. The service and the staff are great. Really easy and flexible to book an appointment. Raquel is super nice, efficient and always accommodating. On top of that, love the results I am seeing from my treatment!

originalText.text:
I‚Äôve been going to Bioskin Laser for a few months now and have had great experiences. I had multiples sessions of laser hair removal and Venus legacy cellulite reduction treatments done. The results are amazing!
I also can‚Äôt say enough about how professional, knowledgeable and amazing Raquel is.  I would highly recommend.
